name: Layan
description: This rice was the main one used on Xero for a while, uses Latte for both Panels & Dock. It is intended to be mainly used on XeroLinux. NOT intended for low-end systems !

name: Nord
description: This is a Nordic themed rice. Uses the Nord theme with Latte-Dock for panels as well as Dock. Separated into multiple zones. NOT intended for low-end systems. Very heavy on resources !

name: Sweet
description: This rice is super simple, based on the SweetKDE theme with Candy Icons, not very Busy. It is intended to be mainly used on XeroLinux. Have fun. NOT intended for low-end systems !

name: Dunes
description: This one was fully created by "GamerKing64". After a long time spent learning the structure of KDE Plasma this rice was born. We are very proud of him for graduating to full-time ricer status.ðŸ˜‰"

name: Catppuccin
description: This one was created by "TeddyBearKilla" & I. After a long time spent optimizing it, this rice was born. We are very proud of it. NOT intended for low-end systems ! ðŸ˜‰"
